channel.title: day16 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in day16 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: My thoughts about this entry are not neutral.
item.description: 06:14 Wednesday 05 June 2019 JST In Portland, I noticed how dramatically my experience was affected just by the focus of my emotions. If I focused on love the experience was wonderfully positive. If I focused on fear, the experience was horrifically negative. It was like an exponential amplifier that responded profoundly to the slightest deviation from neutral. Today is Day 16 for me in A Course in Miracles
